# BuildVerse AI Studio - llms.txt
# Optimized for AI crawlers and LLM readability

## About BuildVerse

BuildVerse is an AI studio specializing in MVP development, voice agents, and workflow automation for B2B SaaS companies. We ship production-ready products in 4-8 weeks.

## Primary Services

1. MVP Development (4-8 weeks)
   - Rapid prototyping and iteration
   - AI-first architecture
   - Production-ready codebases

2. AI Voice Agents (2-4 weeks)
   - 24/7 call handling
   - Lead qualification
   - Appointment booking
   - CRM integration

3. Workflow Automation (2-3 weeks)
   - Process automation
   - Tool integration
   - Data pipeline automation

4. Analytics & Dashboards (3-5 weeks)
   - Custom dashboards
   - Predictive analytics
   - Real-time insights

## Target Industries

- B2B SaaS companies
- Tech-first SMBs
- Mid-market enterprises
- Healthcare
- Fintech
- E-commerce
- Logistics

## Key Differentiators

- Founder-led execution
- End-to-end capability
- Cross-industry experience
- Fast iteration cycles (weekly milestones)
- Production-ready code from day one

## Technology Stack

- React, Next.js
- Node.js, TypeScript
- AI/ML: Gemini API, OpenAI
- Voice: WebRTC, Speech Recognition
- Databases: PostgreSQL, Supabase
- Cloud: Cloudflare Pages, R2

## Typical Project Timeline

Week 1: Discovery and scoping
Weeks 2-3: Prototype development
Weeks 4-6: Production deployment
Ongoing: Optimization and iteration

## Results Delivered

- 10,000+ daily calls handled by voice agents
- 200+ hours saved monthly through automation
- 95%+ customer satisfaction
- 60% cost reduction in support operations
- 4-8 week delivery timelines

- 50+ businesses served
